one region around Yanda County but if the farmers can manage to tap into this Market there is high demand the other Supply that may be experienced around the year is also short live meaning that for harvesting and my doesn't need those expensive chemicals or even fertilizer you just plant it and manage it and that's all you have good to go and within those at least let's say 40 days you will manage to have harvested around 200 kilos from the farm if you sell each kg for 40 Shillings then it gives you a Le of 8,000 Shillings if you L your cost of 2,300 Shillings you are left with a profit on these several props once they realize that they will always be coming to you
